attributes.action: Make it law to those who have dogs provide a post box guard for safety
attributes.additional_details:
We demand to make it law to those with dogs have a guard on their letter box for safety of adults/children and any delivery personnel in a job form.  At present their is only a law for public place if bitten by a dog not for delivering to a house.

I was bitten on 12th february 2014 on my finger posting a message.  This could have been a child and came of so much worse even though mine was bad enough.

Please sign this petition thanks Maria Dodsworth
